name: Killer Bunny
description:
Killer Bunny is an action-based platformer where players will traverse wild lands as a bunny protagonist, hunting the wretched spiders and snakes that killed their parents. At the end of the game, the bunny will face “Daddy Snake” and “Mommy Spider” — the primordial beings responsible for all spider and snake spawn. 

Through a simple yet tragic narrative, players will progress through levels where they must slaughter snakes and spiders. They will also have a number of items and upgrades at their disposal to assist them in combat.

The visual style is colorful and playful, and the story has a slightly dark and vengeful tone.
